name: Night Ninja
description:
My First Video Game

I am a high school student that enjoys not only playing video games but designing and creating them. I have a huge passion when it comes to programming and creating things from scratch to see how far they get. I have made 6 other games, but haven't really finished them and decided to finish this one and publish for a first game since the others are larger, but I'll work on publishing more of those.

RUN

Night Ninja is an endless runner, where your a ninja and set the scene on a samurai-themed path. Your goal is to collect as many coins as possible and hold the furthest distance IN ORDER TOOOO.....

WIN PRIZES

Within Night Ninja there is a constantly accurate and updatable scoreboard where your high score can be posted. There you'll see the top 10 players and the top 2 players win prizes after the end of the first 2 months after release on PC.
